body.name: Utensil holder for Kitchen Counter- Large Utensils Holder For Farmhouse Cooking 13.5" x 4.3" x 6.9" with Wooden Base Matte Black Cooking Utensil Holder Spatula Holder Utensil Caddy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: [Ample Utensil Storage]: This kitchen utensil holder measures 13.5" x 4.2" x 6.9", offering ample space for your culinary essentials. With three compartments, it accommodates a variety of items, including cookware, knives, spatulas, tongs, egg beaters, ladles, skimmers, peelers, corkscrews, silverware, forks, chopsticks, and more. Maintain a neat and organized kitchen countertop effortlessly.

[Charming Farmhouse Decor]: Crafted from rustproof steel with a wooden base, this matte black utensil holder exudes rustic charm. Its timeless design seamlessly complements various kitchen decor styles, infusing your culinary space with a touch of elegance and a splash of color.

[Accessible Design]: With its open top design, this utensil holder guarantees that your cookware remains in plain sight and easily accessible whenever required. This rustic-style holder exudes a unique and appealing charm, perfectly aligning with your kitchen decor while enhancing functionality. Enjoy greater comfort and convenience in your culinary pursuits.

[Optimal Storage Environment]: Featuring a metal mesh edge, this utensil holder offers enhanced ventilation, facilitating the rapid and efficient drying of your cutlery. This innovative design ensures that your utensils remain dry, promoting a hygienic and comfortable cooking environment. The farmhouse-inspired charm of this utensil holder further contributes to the cozy atmosphere of your kitchen.

[Wonderful Gift Idea]: This kitchen utensil holder is a fitting present for those who have a passion for life and a love for cooking. If you have a diligent friend or cherished individual in your life, our product makes an excellent gift choice. It's a thoughtful way to show appreciation for their hard work and culinary endeavors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wire and wood utensil holder
reviews.reviewText: Really like the size of this. We have lots of cooking utensils and this holds them well. Easy to find what you need. Nothing will build up inside to surprise you. It quite sturdy and looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a good size and holds a lot of utensils. It looks very nice on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this holder! Stylish and big enough for all my spatulas, wooden spoons, whisks, etc.
reviews.reviewText: Love this holder! Each of the three bays is big enough for at least a dozen utensils. The bases has little rubber bumpers that keep it slightly elevated off the countertop, which allows for air flow so you don't have to worry about water getting trapped and causing mildew. The dividers are removable if you want to use it for larger things but I keep them in so they help to keep all my utensils upright and accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for all of my utensils
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad I found this, I was using 2 round containers that were taking up too much space. This fits well against the cupboard and holds everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3 stars or 4 stars?
reviews.reviewText: The utensil holder is pretty nice. Very large, has the drain holes, soft rubber pads on the bottom, and the fence is secured to the wood base with screws. Feels sturdy. I actually am using this holder for those large spray bottles you can get from Home Depot (see photo). It's almost like they were made for the bottles. Since I know most people will be using this for kitchen utensils I dumped a bunch of utensils into the holder. They work great for one side but the other side not so well as the inner fence that separates the sections pops out the minute you grab a utensil. One would have to use a zip tie to secure the sectional to the fence. Considering the price, I probably would have given this a 3 star, but since this fits my needs perfectly for the bottles, it deserves 4 stars from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the utensil holder!
reviews.reviewText: I love the three different sections. It's so handy right by my stovetop. Very nice looking. Great quality.
